testcase.name: Login to application
testcase.system-out: Given User should navigate to ProAcc page...................................passed And User enters GlobalVariable.uc and GlobalVariable.pc.....................passed When User clicks on LOG IN button...........................................passed Then User will be logged in successfully....................................passed

testcase.name: Assessment Monitor functionality
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Assessment Monitor page....................................passed When User has to select Project NameAlexa Pilot Phase Test and Instance NameP01 from the dropdown for Assessment Monitor.passed And User has to click on select instance button for Assessment Monitor......passed And User has to edit a particular task3,5,Work In Progress..................passed Then User should select instance successfully for Assessment Monitor........passed
